name: Park
story: You are at the park, lying on the meadows, gazing at stars
nav: Press 1 to go home, press 2 to go to the riverside and press 3 to go to the candy shop

name: Home
story: You are sitting beside the fire place,with a cup of coffee
nav: press 1 to go park, 2 to go to the candy shop, or 3 to go to the restaurant

name: River
story: You are on the riverside, looking at the moving boats
nav: Press 1 to go back home, press 2 to go to the candy shop, and press 3 to go to the fishing harbour

name: candy shop
story: you are at the candy shop, buying some candies for your friends
nav: Press 1 to go to the fishing harbor, Press 2 to go to the restaurant. Press 3 to go to back home

name: Restaurant
story: You are at the restaurant having biriyani
nav: press 1 to go to the fishing harbor, press 2 to go home, press 3 to go the ship

name: fishing harbour
story: You are at the fishing harbor, looking at the wide variety of fishes
nav: Press 1  to go home. Press 2 to go to ship. Press 3 to go to park

name: Ship
story: You are on the ship, to set out for the journey to find the giant pearl
nav: Press 1 to go to home 2 to go to the lower deck 3 to go to fishing harbor

name: Lower Deck
story: you are hiding on the lower deck and nobody on the ship knows you are in the ship
nav: press 1 to go the fishing harbor, 2 to go to the pearl box, 3 to go to sea

name: Pearl box
story: You saw a box of pearls, hidden underneath
nav: Press 1 to go to the upper deck, and press 2 to go to sea, and press 3 to go to fishing harbor

name: Coral reefs
story: you are at the coral reefs, wondering at its beauty
nav: Press 1 to go to sea 2 to go to sea turtles colony 3 to go to trench

name: sea
story: You are in the sea
nav: Press 1 to go to the sea turtle colony 2 to the trench shop 3 to the beach side

name: sea turtle's colony
story: you are in the middle of a sea turtles colony
nav: Press 1 to go to snake den, press 2 to go to trench and press 3 to go to polar iceburg.

name: beach side
story: You are at the eastern coast taking a sun bath
nav: press 1 to go to the snake den, press 2 to explore the seafood store 3 to go to the beach side

name: Snake Den
story: You are surrounded by snakes and you need to escape. Otherwise you will die
nav: press 1 to go to the trench, press 2 to go to seafood store, press 3 to go to the shell shop

name: Trench
story: You are being pulled down by the gravity and you are trying to resist the force. You lost

name: polar iceburg
story: In the freezing temperature, you are almost dead
nav: press 1 to go to the snake den, 2 to go to trench, 3 to the shell shop

name: seafood store
story: you are at the sea food store, having a seafood meal
nav: press 1 to go to beach side 2 to sea turtles colony or 3 to the shell shop

name: shell shop
story: You are in the shell shop, to sell some shells
nav: Press 1 to go to reselling store Press 2 to go to giant oyster, Press 3 to go to the trench

name: reselling store
story: you are at the reselling store to sell some sea goods
nav: press 1 to go to go to the ship wreck, press 2 to go to raft and press 3 to go to the fishing net.

name: Raft
story: You found a raft and trying to escape on it
nav: Press 1 to go to giant oyster, 2 to go to underwater volcano, and 3 to go to ocean bed

name: forest
story: you are in the forest, trying to save yourself from man-eating tigers
nav: press 1 to go to the ship wreck, 2 to go to the underwater volcano, 3 to go to pirana

name: jewel shop
story: you are in the jewel shop to sell some pearls. You will become a millionaire.. You win
nav: press 1 to go to the reselling store,press 2 to see the sea food store, press 3 to go to fishing net

name: fishing net
story: you got caught on the fishing net and need to find a way out
nav: Press 1 to go to the waste can, press 2 to go to the forest, press 3 to go to the giant oyster

name: waste can
story: you are surrounded by trillions of waste cans in the middle sea
nav: press 1 to go to Ocean Bed, press 2 to go Ship wreck and press 3 to go to Upper Deck.

name: Ship wreck
story: Sharp edges of the shipping wreck may kill you.. You lost

name: Giant Oyster
story: You found the giant oyster, and the giant pearl in it. You will be millionaire.. You win..

name: underwater volcano
story: Volcano erupted and you got washed away. You lost

name: ocean bed
story: Giant crabs will eat you.. You lost..

name: Pirana
story: Pirana will eat you.. You lose

name: upper deck
story: you are at the upper deck and the officers will find you.. You lost
